short_summary: Purchase of a Numerically Controlled Lathe (CNC) machine, including installation and training. Delivery in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. Interested parties submit their proposals by July 13, 2023.
description: The contract is for the purchase of a technically advanced, high-speed, Numerically Controlled Lathe (CNC) machine capable of facilitating a high degree of precision in turning, drilling, and other machined parts operations. The proposed Lathe shall meet performance requirements that are specified, and all provides should be delivered within the contract terms thereby helping increase the efficiency of performing manufactured items. Installation is expected to have completed before the contracted supplier will be called upon for training to be carried out with the team with possession of the facility in real-time suffering with limited infrastructure. Projects should not be impacted. Upon fulfillment of the requested criteria, the selected supplier/l4 supplier shall be required to facilitateawan supplemented memorandums to the OCC.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal for the Acquisition of a Numerically Controlled Lathe (CNC)
#### Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Number: WS3707972918
* Title: Purchase of a Computer Numerical Control (CNC) Lathe
* Publication Date: April 25, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: July 13, 2023, 2 PM EDT
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)
* Solicitation Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Request Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of a Numerically Controlled Lathe (CNC), including installation and training. The successful bidder will be required to deliver and service the machine in Montreal, Québec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.

#### Contract Details
* Contract Category: Goods and services
* Contract Term: 2023-2024
* Regions of Delivery: Montreal, Québec, Canada
* Correcting Entities: PSPC, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec K1A 0S5
* End-User Entities: DND, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2

#### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to various trade agreements, including:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information
Luc Brunet, PSPC/SPAC
Contact Person
Email: luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Documents and Resources
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted in accordance with the contracting authorities' instructions. Bidders are also responsible for communicating with the contracting entity for clarification purposes.

#### Disclaimer
The information
